about_the_game:
Do not panic…don't even breathe! The Quiet Ones are back for a brand new DLC for Sker Ritual!

Isaac has returned still consumed by the darkness that holds The Sker Hotel, a victim of his own obsession.



The Quiet Ones DLC unlocks a new mask and exclusive items so that you can play your part in restoring The Sker Hotel to her glory days.

Isaac paid the ultimate price for the Siren’s Song and now he returns to the halls of Sker Hotel. Find familiarity at the Ritual Site and stalk enemies to restore the Williams’ great legacy, proudly displaying the Ritual Emblem or shout about it with Isaac’s shout.



This pack includes 4 new items:

Isaac Unmasked

An Exclusive Premium Mask of the obsessed inventor Isaac Williams, Unmasked

Ritual Site

An Exclusive Premium Animated Menu Background of the Ritual Site

Isaac’s Shout

An Exclusive In-Game Voice Line to taunt your enemies

Ritual Emblem

An Exclusive Ritual Emblem Player Icon to show everyone who has returned
